casebody.data:
TOWN OF BEECH MOUNTAIN
v.
GENESIS WILDLIFE SANCTUARY, INC. 230A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 13, 2016

Mr. Patrick H. Flanagan, Ms. Meagan I. Kiser, Mr. Stacy C. Eggers, IV, Ms. Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorneys at Law, For Town of Beech Mountain.

Mr. Charles E. Clement, Mr. Charles A. Brady, III, Mr. John J. Korzen, Attorneys at Law, For Genesis Wildlife Sanctuary, Inc.

Mr. William J. Brian, Jr., Attorney at Law, For Pacific Legal Foundation

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of October 2016 by Pacific Legal Foundation for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

*251"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of October 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
